title: Blake-Ryan Welcome Third Baby, Fans File Petition For Robert Downey Jr And More From Ent
text:
Blake-Ryan Welcome Third Baby, Fans File Petition For Robert Downey Jr And More From Ent

Blake-Ryan Welcome Third Baby, Fans File Petition For Robert Downey Jr And More From Ent

It's baby number three for Actress Blake Lively and husband Ryan Reynolds. Multiple reports suggest that the actress recently gave birth to a baby. The couple has not revealed the sex or the name of the baby but they are overjoyed by the arrival of their third child, reported E! News.

According to a report in ComicBook.com, Disney and Marvel are only focusing on categories including Best Cinematography, Visual Effects, Film Editing, Original Score, and also Best Adapted Screenplay, Best Director and Best Picture. Marvel Studios scored its first Best Picture nomination in 2018, for Black Panther.

An old video of Shah Rukh Khan, anchoring a New Years eve show in the early ‘90s is going viral on the internet and it's special for reasons more than one.

Don't Miss 154 SHARES 104 SHARES

Recently, Actor Neena Gupta shared pictures from her prosthetics session for her upcoming film and everyone was floored with her determination. Considering the fact that prosthetics can be a mentally and physically taxing experience, everyone is praising Neena Gupta's patience.

Reacting to the news, Bollywood celebrities condemned the decision and expressed their anger.
description: It's baby number three for Actress Blake Lively and husband Ryan Reynolds. Multiple reports suggest that the actress recently gave birth to a baby. The couple has not revealed the sex or the name of the baby but they are overjoyed by the arrival of their third child, reported E! News.
